content: **crocheted heart/christmas decoration in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-803 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 7 cm length = 6 cm without strap / 12 cm with strap **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 09 nutmeg 50 g colour 12 red 50 g colour 61 light taupe 50 g colour 81 clay 50 g colour 85 mustard 50 g colour 87 pomegranate 50 g colour 88 pistachio 50 g colour 90 moss green 1 heart weighs approx 5 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
